com.example.bot.spring

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.bot.spring.User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object
    A class used to do tasks directly related to the user It will use many functions in userDB.class
    Since:
    2017-11-18

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int check_day(java.lang.String id)
      This function is going to check the days from now to the target date if get the target date from the user list and change it into the Date type And then we calculate the days by the two date
      static boolean check_followtime(java.lang.String id, java.util.Date date)
      This function check the user's follow time depending on the coupon begin date
      static int check_goal(java.lang.String id)
      This function is going to check whether the user achieve the goal or meet the target date It has four different conditions which can be used in the controller to push message to the user
      static boolean delete_record(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String text)
      This function is just created for the test case This function is going to delete the corresponding row in the user table And it is not used in the controller it just use one function in the userDB class to connection to the database
      static boolean delete(java.lang.String id)
      This function is going to delete the user from user list and also delete the user table and the user's coupon in coupon table
      static java.lang.String generateSummary(java.lang.String id)
      This function is going to generate a summary from the user table It will calculate all the data since the user first user the chatbot and add them together And then it will output a simple summary of the user's intake overall
      static java.lang.String generateWeeklySummary(java.lang.String id)
      This function is going to generate at most 7 days summary from the user table record It will calculate the average intake and weight of the user And also output everyday's record
      static float getDailyIntake(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String date)
      This function is going to get the energy the user has consumed at certain day It use the function DBsearch_day in the userDB.class to get the record at certain day
      static int getIdealDailyIntake(java.lang.String id)
      This function is going to calculate the ideal daily intake of the user depend on the information in the user list It will get the data from user list and divide them into daily intake
      static java.lang.String getUser(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String column)
      This function is going to get user data from the user list it calls the function select_userlist in the userDB.class to get the result
      static boolean insert(java.lang.String id, java.util.Date date)
      This function check the userlist and usertable and the user follow time from database it calls 3 functions from userDB.class in order to connect to the database it insert new user into the userlist with the followtime and create a new user table for him/her
      static boolean setDay(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String text)
      This function is going to change an integer the user input for the days to target into a date format And then change the date into the format dd/mm/yyyy and insert it into the user list table it will be more precise for the further checking
      static boolean setUser(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String column, java.lang.String text)
      This function is going to set the data in the given row and column in the user list It calls the function update_userlist in userDB.class
      static boolean updateRecord(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String text)
      This function is to update user table with the input text and the user's weight at this time it get the user's weight at this time from the user list table

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public static boolean insert(java.lang.String id,
                             java.util.Date date)
        This function check the userlist and usertable and the user follow time from database it calls 3 functions from userDB.class in order to connect to the database it insert new user into the userlist with the followtime and create a new user table for him/her
        Parameters:
        id - input the user id in order to check and create table
        date - input the Coupon begin date in order to check whether the user can get coupon
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean type, if true, insert success

      • check_followtime

        public static boolean check_followtime(java.lang.String id,
                                       java.util.Date date)
        This function check the user's follow time depending on the coupon begin date
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id and change the user list at this user id with the follow time
        date - Input the coupon begin date to check whether the user follow the chatbot before the begin date
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean in order to tell whether the user follow the chatbot before the begin date

      • delete

        public static boolean delete(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to delete the user from user list and also delete the user table and the user's coupon in coupon table
        Parameters:
        id - Input user id in order to connect to the data base to delete the related things
        Returns:
        result Return true if all there things are done

      • updateRecord

        public static boolean updateRecord(java.lang.String id,
                                   java.lang.String text)
        This function is to update user table with the input text and the user's weight at this time it get the user's weight at this time from the user list table
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id in order to search user's weight and insert record in to the user table
        text - Input the food name and get other data with the food name
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean, if all the tasks are done, return true

      • delete_record

        public static boolean delete_record(java.lang.String id,
                                    java.lang.String text)
        This function is just created for the test case This function is going to delete the corresponding row in the user table And it is not used in the controller it just use one function in the userDB class to connection to the database
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to find the user table
        text - Input the food name to find a row in the user table
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean value to check whether the function finished

      • getUser

        public static java.lang.String getUser(java.lang.String id,
                                       java.lang.String column)
        This function is going to get user data from the user list it calls the function select_userlist in the userDB.class to get the result
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to find the row in the user list
        column - Input the column name to find the column in the user list
        Returns:
        result Return a String with the data in the given row and column

      • setUser

        public static boolean setUser(java.lang.String id,
                              java.lang.String column,
                              java.lang.String text)
        This function is going to set the data in the given row and column in the user list It calls the function update_userlist in userDB.class
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to find the row in user list
        column - Input the column name to find the column in the user list
        text - Input the data you want to update
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean value to check whether all the tasks are done

      • setDay

        public static boolean setDay(java.lang.String id,
                             java.lang.String text)
        This function is going to change an integer the user input for the days to target into a date format And then change the date into the format dd/mm/yyyy and insert it into the user list table it will be more precise for the further checking
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to find the corresponding row in the user list
        text - Input the target days(an integer but with type String)
        Returns:
        result Return a boolean value. If update succeed, return true. else, return false.

      • check_day

        public static int check_day(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to check the days from now to the target date if get the target date from the user list and change it into the Date type And then we calculate the days by the two date
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to find the days_for_target column in the user list
        Returns:
        result Return an integer which is from now to the target date

      • check_goal

        public static int check_goal(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to check whether the user achieve the goal or meet the target date It has four different conditions which can be used in the controller to push message to the user
        Parameters:
        id - Input user id to get the user's weight and target weight and also the target date
        Returns:
        result Return an integer(1,2,3,4) to tell which condition the user is in

      • getDailyIntake

        public static float getDailyIntake(java.lang.String id,
                                   java.lang.String date)
        This function is going to get the energy the user has consumed at certain day It use the function DBsearch_day in the userDB.class to get the record at certain day
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to get the user table
        date - Input the date and search the user table with the date
        Returns:
        result Return the energy consumed at that date. If not found, return 0

      • getIdealDailyIntake

        public static int getIdealDailyIntake(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to calculate the ideal daily intake of the user depend on the information in the user list It will get the data from user list and divide them into daily intake
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to get the user's information from the user list
        Returns:
        IdealDailyIntake Return an integer which is the calculate result of the daily intake

      • generateSummary

        public static java.lang.String generateSummary(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to generate a summary from the user table It will calculate all the data since the user first user the chatbot and add them together And then it will output a simple summary of the user's intake overall
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to get the data from user table
        Returns:
        output Return a String with the energy, sodium, fatty consumed from the first day the user used to now

      • generateWeeklySummary

        public static java.lang.String generateWeeklySummary(java.lang.String id)
        This function is going to generate at most 7 days summary from the user table record It will calculate the average intake and weight of the user And also output everyday's record
        Parameters:
        id - Input the user id to get the user table
        Returns:
        output Return a String with average data and everyday's data
